arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs. Freiburg preview: Hosts targeting second straight win
arts.sum: Werder Bremen will attempt to claim back-to-back wins when they welcome Freiburg to the Weserstadion on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Playing for Germany ‘not impossible’ for Patrick Osterhage
arts.sum: Patrick Osterhage’s rise as a footballer is finally blooming. After joining Borussia Dortmund at 17, the player’s development didn’t go as planned due to persistent hip injuries. Playing for BVB…

arts.ttl: ‘Made them very nervous’: Bundesliga insider says Freiburg can’t withstand Liverpool bid for ‘young Messi’
arts.sum: Liverpool Football Club are understood to be in the market for a midfield signing. The Merseysiders attempted to pursue a move for Real Sociedad star Martin Zubimendi, though were subjected to a sharp turn of face from the Spaniard in the summer transfer window. The La Real star’s decision to stay put in San Sebastian […] The post ‘Made them very nervous’: Bundesliga insider says Freiburg can’t withstand Liverpool bid for ‘young Messi’ appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Preview: Werder Bremen vs. Freiburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Werder Bremen and Freiburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Friedl speaks on return against Freiburg and surprise Austrian call-up
arts.sum: In comments published on the club's website SV Werder Bremen captain Marco Friedl has commented on the difficulty of sitting out last Sunday's win against Hoffehnheim and the perils of facing Freiburg this weekend The 26-year-old also addressed his surprise nomination for Ralf Rangnick's Austrian national team after an absence of nearly two years.
